summary: THE CONSUMER WAS INVOLVED IN AN ACCIDENT DUE TO A FAULTY EMERGENCY BRAKE.  THE TECHNICIAN FOUND  THE EMERGENCY BRAKE CABLE WAS MISSING, AND THE MANUFACTURER NEVER PLACED ONE ON THE VEHICLE.  THE CONSUMER SMELLED SOMETHING BURNING, AND FOUND THE CABLE HAD MELTED.  SCC. ALSO THE WINDSHIELD WAS INSTALLED IMPROPERLY.  *JB
